snippet.title: Nightingale | Release Date Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Master the beguiling and dangerous Fae Realms, and become a Realmwalker of legend, when Nightingale launches into Early Access on February 22nd, 2024.

Read our blog for more details on Nightingale’s Early Access release: https://playnightingale.com/news/release-date-trailer-gamescom-2023

Wishlist Nightingale today: 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928980/Nightingale/
Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/nightingale

Nightingale is a PVE, open-world survival crafting game played solo or cooperatively with friends. Build, craft, fight and explore as you venture through mystical portals into a variety of amazing and fantastical realms.

Sign-up for more news at https://www.playnightingale.com

Follow Nightingale on Social Media:
Nightingale Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playnightingale
Nightingale Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playnightin...
Nightingale TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@playnightingale
Nightingale Twitter: https://twitter.com/playnightingale
